mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note_share (note_id, share_code, share_url, password, expire_time, view_count, status, create_time) VALUES (#{noteId}, #{shareCode}, #{shareUrl}, #{password}, #{expireTime}, #{viewCount}, #{status}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE note_share SET note_id=#{noteId}, share_code=#{shareCode}, share_url=#{shareUrl}, password=#{password}, expire_time=#{expireTime}, view_count=#{viewCount}, status=#{status}, create_time=#{createTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, note_id, share_code, share_url, password, expire_time, view_count, status, create_time FROM note_share WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, note_id, share_code, share_url, password, expire_time, view_count, status, create_time FROM note_share ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, note_id, share_code, share_url, password, expire_time, view_count, status, create_time FROM note_share WHERE user_id=#{userId}
